mapper.select: select count(0) as amount from access_data.api_key where api_key = #{apiKey}
select id, username, password, is_active, is_credentials_non_expired, last_login_dat from access_data."user" where username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into access_data.user (id, username, password, is_active, is_credentials_non_expired, last_login_dat, cre_dat, mod_dat, cre_usr, mod_usr) values ( default, #{user.username}, #{user.password}, default, default, null, now(), now(), user, user )
mapper.select: select r."name" from access_data."user" u, access_data.user_role ur, access_data."role" r where u.username = #{username} and ur.role_id = r.id and u.id = ur.user_id and r.is_active = true
select value from access_data.settings where key = #{key}
